text: Jack Henry Harris (November 28, 1918 â€“ March 14, 2017) was an American movie producer. He produced many blockbuster Hollywood movies including The Blob (1958), 4D Man (1959), and Equinox (1970). Harris died March 14, 2017, at his home in Beverly Hills, California from complications of pneumonia, aged 98. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1918 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:American movie producers Category:Businesspeople from Philadelphia
title: Jack H. Harris
